p: A search of the studies was conducted in the following databases: Medline (via PubMed), Virtual Health Library (VHL), The Cochrane Library and Center for Reviews and Dissemination (CRD). Only studies in English, Spanish and Portuguese were selected according to the Methodological Guideline: elaboration of a systematic review and meta-analysis of randomized clinical trials, as an attempt to increase the reproducibility of the study, since there is no guideline for systematic review in economic studies. [ 7].
